linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 (12.04 theoretical)
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia drivers, OpenGL 3.2, 2x Anti-aliasing
  • Sound Card: sudo apt install libsdl2-2.0-0
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard defaults to a 2-player setup but can be changed under Options.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia drivers, OpenGL 3.2, 8x AA, 1920x1080 (HD), very large display
  • Sound Card: sudo apt install libsdl2-2.0-0
  • Additional Notes: Multiple dual-analog gamepads STRONGLY recommended!
